subject: Marketing
title: Organic vs Paid Social
description: A quick win: understand Organic vs Paid Social.

hook.text: Facebook organic reach for brand pages dropped from 16% to under 2% in a decade.

buildup.text: Platforms deliberately throttle organic reach to push brands toward paid promotion.

discovery.text: Organic social builds community and trust. Paid social scales reach and drives conversions.

climax.text: Organic warms the audience. Paid converts them. Both are necessary for a healthy strategy.
